alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Ontario; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wayne, Cayuga and northeastern Ontario Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lyons, or 10 miles northwest of Waterloo, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Lyons, Clyde, Chimney Bluffs State Park, Rose, Huron, Conquest, Savannah, Wolcott, Port Byron, Red Creek, North Rose, Alton, South Butler, Port Bay, West Junius and Fairville. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
